instructions: Open the News app on your Apple Watch. Scroll through the story summary by turning the Digital Crown. To read the story on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, scroll to the bottom of the story, then tap Save for Later. To open the story on your compatible device, do one of the following: iPhone or iPod touch: Open the News app on an iPhone or iPod touch with iOS 13, tap Following, tap Saved Stories, then tap the story. iPad: On an iPad with iPadOS 13 or iOS 12 or later, open the News app, tap Saved Stories in the sidebar, then tap the story. Mac: On a Mac with macOS Mojave, open the News app, click Saved Stories in the sidebar, then click the story.

Open the News app on your Apple Watch. Wake iPhone, then open the App Switcher. (On an iPhone with Face ID, swipe up from the bottom edge and pause; on an iPhone with a Home button, double-click the Home button.) Tap the button that appears at the bottom of the screen to open News.
